Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds significant value and could greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This price reflects not only the quality and features of the product but also the opportunity to secure it at a competitive advantage. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
